description.text: Never give up, never run away and desert the Last Bastion! Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: Never give up, never run away and desert the Last Bastion! Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: Никогда не сдавайся и не убегай, ведь это последний бастион! Два куба и база.

es.original: Never give up, never run away and desert the Last Bastion! Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
¡Defiende el último bastión!
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: Never give up, never run away and desert the Last Bastion! Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Gebt niemals auf! Bei dieser letzten Bastion wird nicht desertiert! Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

pt.original: Never give up, never run away and desert the Last Bastion! Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: O último dos bastiões! Dois Cubos e uma Base.

fr.original: Never give up, never run away and desert the Last Bastion! Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: N'abandonnez jamais ! Interdiction de fuir et de déserter ce bastion ! Deux cubes et une base.
